text: FC United are an English football team. They are from Manchester and were formed in 2005 by fans when Malcolm Glazer bought Manchester United. FC United of Manchester play their home matches at Broadhurst Park, Moston, Manchester. They play in the National League North. They have a First team, Reserve team, Under-18s team, and Women's team. == Other websites == *FC United of Manchester official website Category:2005 establishments in England Category:Football clubs in Greater Manchester
title: F.C. United of Manchester
